description: Modifies the validation setting for a policy store.

parameters.name: policyStoreId
parameters.description: Specifies the ID of the policy store that you want to update.

parameters.name: validationSettings
parameters.description: A structure that defines the validation settings that want to enable for the policy store. The validation mode currently configured for this policy store. The valid values are: OFF --- Neither Verified Permissions nor Cedar perform any validation on policies. No validation errors are reported by either service. STRICT --- Requires a schema to be present in the policy store. Cedar performs validation on all submitted new or updated static policies and policy templates. Any that fail validation are rejected and Cedar doesn't store them in the policy store.

nested_params.name: mode
nested_params.description: The validation mode currently configured for this policy store. The valid values are:

parameters.name: deletionProtection
parameters.description: Specifies whether the policy store can be deleted. If enabled, the policy store can't be deleted. When you call UpdatePolicyStore, this parameter is unchanged unless explicitly included in the call.

nested_items.name: policyStoreId
nested_items.description: The ID of the updated policy store.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the updated policy store.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy store was originally created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date and time that the policy store was most recently updated.
